headline: Teamsters Challenge UPS Driver Buyouts And Raise Questions On Labor Risk
summary: Teamsters Union has filed a legal challenge against United Parcel Service (NYSE:UPS) over a new driver buyout program. The union alleges UPS violated the National Master Agreement by introducing a second, unauthorized buyout and seeking direct deals with drivers. The Teamsters argue that the program encourages drivers to waive union rights and could cause irreparable harm to union representation. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:UPS, this dispute sits at the intersection of parcel...

headline: Local Business Owner Celebrates New Venture in Cornelius, North Carolina with Opening of Their Third PostalAnnex--Offering Shipping and More Office Services
summary: Annex Brands, Inc., one of the leading franchisors in the packing, shipping and office services industries, is excited to announce the opening of its newest PostalAnnex location in Cornelius, NC to new owner, Ajay Guthi. This new PostalAnnex, formerly known as Postmarked, is Ajay's third PostalAnnex location and is set to offer a wide range of essential shipping and office services to the local community, making it easier to get more done in one stop.

headline: Local Business Owner Celebrates New Venture with Opening of Their First PostalAnnex in Houston, Texas
summary: Annex Brands, Inc., one of the leading franchisors in the packing, shipping and office services industries, is excited to announce the opening of its newest PostalAnnex location between the Montrose and Boulevard Oaks communities in Houston, Texas, to Hiren Patel. This new PostalAnnex is set to offer a wide range of essential shipping and office services to the local community, making it easier to Get More Done in One Stop.

headline: Is It Time To Reassess UPS (UPS) After Its Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether United Parcel Service (UPS) is attractively priced right now, this article will walk you through what the numbers are saying about its current valuation. UPS shares last closed at US$117.92, with returns of 6.9% over the past week, 9.1% over the past month, 16.7% year to date, and 10.4% over the past year, set against longer term 3 year and 5 year returns of 26.7% and 11.3% declines respectively. These mixed returns frame the context for recent interest in UPS...
